column5: Rick Martin dies in a car accident here in Clarence, NY  http://www.buffalonews.com/sports/sabres-nhl/article366076.ece
too bad, very young.  Legendary however, is a great exageration, decent at best.
No exaggeration.  A local legend for a young Buffalo team in it's early years. No different than Eddie Shack being a Toronto legend
Not only that but from everything I have read and told by hockey fans, Rick was a great man on and off the ice....we need more like that in sports.
With the Leafs playing Buffalo last night, they were talking about the french connection line.  The Fan590 also had Gilbert Perrault on the radio Friday morning.
